2: room on the ground floor feels like there is no privacy at all
When you open the french window for a fresh air you hear every conversation on the parking lot and in the yard and you can be seen by anyone from there
There was no bar soap or shower cap in the room
We were surprised that there were no coo fee and tea families in the room
Also TV was on a side wall that was not easily viewed
no water cattle in the room
Have a kid that wanted to see tv
The suite has a small kitchen with a stove but not a single kitchen utensil
